Question Type: from cause to effect without intervention
Explanation: The air conditioning is turned on according to the condition specified in the setTemperature method. When the temperature exceeds 25 degrees, the airConditioningOn attribute is set to true, without any external intervention.
causal_map: newTemperature > 25 → airConditioningOn = true; temperature → newTemperature; newTemperature → airConditioningOn
causal_map_integration: Setting the temperature above 25 degrees Celsius directly turns on the air conditioning. The temperature setting influences whether the air conditioning is on.
